SSH Jump Servers With SmartCard Login

Network Zone Primary Server Alternate Server Getting Access
DMZ dmzv3login01.ornl.gov dmzv3login02.ornl.gov Request Linux access in DCAMS
M/EC meclogin01.ornl.gov meclogin02.ornl.gov Request Linux Jump Server -> MEC SSH User in UCAMS
OPS opslogin01.ornl.gov opslogin02.ornl.gov Request Linux Jump Server -> OPS SSH User in UCAMS with a secondary userid
Open Research orlogin01.ornl.gov orlogin02.ornl.gov Request Linux Jump Server -> Ooen Research SSH User in UCAMS with a dedicated secondary userid
Workstations (aka RAN) ranlogin01.ornl.gov ranlogin02.ornl.gov Request Linux Jump Server -> RAN SSH User in UCAMS
